channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Surfing the AI Wave: Manage, Govern, and Protect AI Agents with Microsoft Entra Agent ID
item.description:
Last month, when I blogged about riding the AI wave, I reviewed the reality of AI Agent adoption, basic information about agents, and the challenge of managing them at scale. I could only hint about what we’d announce at Microsoft Ignite: a huge update for the Microsoft Entra Agent ID public preview. I’d like to thank customers and partners who’ve been paddling out to the deep waters of agent visibility and security with us. Your feedback has been crucial in this journey, and it was super cool to feature a few of you in my Agent ID Ignite session. Thank you.
🎥 Watch the replay of Alex’s sess...
